title: He Ran All the Way (restored, with intro and outro) (1951, film noir, imdb score: 7)

sources.title: He Ran All The Way 1951 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: He Ran All the Way is a 1951 American crime drama and film noir directed by John Berry and starring John Garfield and Shelley Winters . Distributed by United Artists , it was produced independently by Roberts Pictures, a company named for Garfield's manager and business partner, Bob Roberts, and bankrolled by Garfield. It would be Garfield's last film before his death in 1952 at the age of 39.
